riddle: I'm full of keys but can't open doors, type your thoughts and much more. What am I?
I am the brain, running the show; crunching the numbers fast or slow. Who am I?
I might entice with a subject line, but click with caution or you'll be mine. What am I?
In a maze of wires, I am the map; guiding data, no time for a nap. What am I?
Legions of letters and numerous notes, knowledge and novels, I silently tote. What am I?
Though I sound sick, I'm just a trick; in bits and bytes, I'll stick. What am I?
A space not bound by physical keys, my realm is vast, with info it teems. What am I?
Tiny and many, I'm part of a whole; watching a scene, I'm under control. What am I?
